Package gov.usgs.anss.edgethread

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CommandServerInterface
    This is the interface standard for a class which uses the CommandServer class to implement the server and this definition to implement the commands.
    EdgeThreadInterface
    This interface establishes the minimum required to be an edgethread.
    ManagerInterface
    This is the interface implemented by threads that are to be controlled by a manager process.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CommandServer
    CommandServer.java - This server looks for a telnet type connection, accepts a message of the form command,arg1,arg2\n and execute this command on the creator of this thread through the CommandServerInterface.
    EdgeThread
    This sets up the required /common stuff for a EdgeMom controlled Thread class.
    EdgeThreadTemplate
    This is a template for an EdgeThread (one that can be run by EdgeMom.
    EdgeThreadTimeout
    Class is a time out thread which can be set up with some other EdgeThread to cause it to be interrupted() after some interval and destroy() after some longer interval.
    FakeThread
    This sets up a faked up edgethread so that logging can be used from test routines that do not need to have a real EdgeThread.
    MemoryChecker
    This thread monitors memory and periodically prints a status line.
    MonitorServer
    This server sends a string of Key-Value pairs with monitoring information on the process.
    MonitorStatus
    This thread prints out a EdgeThread status string at intervals.
